title: Most important question about the assassin rework, ever, of the day
body: Champs like {{champion:245}} and {{champion:105}} won't be able to go tank-sassin anymore right?  It'd be really great if they mainly built damage in the future and try to outplay you like they are supposed to instead of building full tank and killing your backline.

replies.body: Yeah tank ekko is completely dead. The healing is non existant on ekko without AP items.

Considering the fact that riot fixed zero issues of ap ekko with this rework I dont see why players would stop playing bruiser ekko.

As for fizz it's a numbers game. if his ap build doesn't one shot you then he would have to build bruiser to actually stay in fights as ap fizz would just fail to kill you and die instantly.

> [{quoted}](name=Linna Excel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xow5AqXE,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-20T04:39:07.858+0000)
>
> instead of building full tank and killing your backline.

I do that on bruisers/tanks. Even with only one single damage item it's really easy since their backline is really squishy and deals very quickly even if you aren't an assassin
I hope to god that tank ekko dies miserably. I hate people who play things that end up being cheese. Fizz is always annoying imo, but I hardly ever see him nowadays and i don't know why.
You know people will,find ways to either bring it back, or make an even more annoying build.
